system.description:
When The Pair is together, they act as a single unit in perfect harmony. They combine their stats when making a Move, and they share the Spotlight together. If either of you has Hope or Despair, you both do.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.uXriNVHOmu3064KN]{Keep Them Busy} together, only one of you needs to stay to Keep Them Busy. The other may disengage and begin @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-pb-pair.Item.5toqO7GOwPC4h3Bp]{Working Alone}.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.gvcPbIgaPctbaOCa]{Get Away} or @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.BnDVkYr6uMhWITB2]{Look Closely} together, you may split up. If you do, each of you may choose different options from that move's list, and you are now @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-pb-pair.Item.5toqO7GOwPC4h3Bp]{Working Alone}.

When one of you takes damage while Working Together, the other takes damage to the same stat, if it is undamaged.

This Move cannot be Shared.
